title: It Takes a Hero
description: A giraffe longs to play football and finally has a chance to live his dream before he must go home.
quote: I have your baby in me, Giraffe.
altHero: a giraffe runs to kick a football held by his teammate
alt2: a crowd watches a football balance on the crossbeam of a goal post
alt3: above the football field, an alien spaceship beams up the giraffe
alt4: a young woman in the crowd speaks emotionally
